pageProduct.name: Palmers Coconut Oil Formula Body Oil 150ml
pageProduct.description:
Information

 

General Information

Palmer's® Coconut Oil Formula Body Oil is a light oil that hydrates and replenishes skin, for youthful radiance.

Palmer's® Coconut Oil Formula Body Oil for bath, body & shower is crafted with antioxidant-rich Extra Virgin Coconut Oil and Green Coffee Extract for radiant, healthy-looking skin. Sustainably harvested raw coconut is rich in natural lipids and proteins for superior hydration and maintaining a healthy glow. Green Coffee Extract is loaded with polyphenols and antioxidants, to keep skin looking youthful. Now with 48 hour moisture.

Suitable For: All skin types.

Product Claims: Deeply hydrates

Size: 150mL

KEY FEATURES

• Hydrates and replenishes skin
• Absorbs quickly
• Parabens, phthalates and dyes free
• Non greasy formula
• Formulated with ethically and sustainably sourced ingredients

Warnings

For external use only. Keep out of reach of children. Avoid contact with eyes. Guard against slipping.

Ingredients

Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Isopropyl Myristate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract, Canola Oil, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Coffea Arabica (Coffee) Seed Oil, Gardenia Tahitensis Flower Extract, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil , Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Argania Spinosa Kernal Oil, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Squalane, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Dimethicone, Fragrance (Parfum), Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Benzoate, Coumarin.

Contains: Coconut Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Green Coffee Extract

Directions

AFTER SHOWER/BATH: Apply to damp skin to lock in moisture. BATH OIL: Add 4-5 pumps to warm water for soothing spa bath. MASSAGE OIL: Warm oil in hands to apply to dry skin as a massage oil or for an instant radiance boost.
